scripts.deploy-dashboard: yarn make-env-files && az portal dashboard create --resource-group "${AZ_RESOURCE_GROUP}" --name "${NAME_PREFIX}-dashboard" --input-path "./dist/env/${NAME_PREFIX}/dashboard.json" --location "${AZ_LOCATION}"
scripts.run-canary: . ./deploy/env-defaults.sh && echo "Sending test data to ${AKS_NAME}." && yarn make-env-files && kubectl delete --ignore-not-found=true -f ./dist/env/${NAME_PREFIX}/tcp-to-blob-canary.yaml && kubectl apply -f ./dist/env/${NAME_PREFIX}/tcp-to-blob-canary.yaml
scripts.re-deploy: yarn docker-push && kubectl patch deployment tcp-to-blob-deployment -p "{\"spec\":{\"template\":{\"metadata\":{\"labels\":{\"date\":\"`date +'%s'`\"}}}}}"
scripts.docker-build: yarn build && docker build . -f deploy/Dockerfile -t tcp-to-blob
scripts.docker-build-canary: yarn build && docker build . -f deploy/Dockerfile-canary -t tcp-to-blob-canary
scripts.docker-run: docker run --env CONTACT_DATA_STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING --env HOST --env PORT --env AKS_CONTACT_DATA_STORAGE_CONTAINER  -p $PORT:$PORT tcp-to-blob
scripts.az-login: ./deploy/check-required-env.sh && . ./deploy/env-defaults.sh && az aks get-credentials --resource-group ${AZ_RESOURCE_GROUP} --name ${AKS_NAME} && az acr login --name ${ACR_NAME}
scripts.docker-push: yarn docker-build && yarn docker-tag && docker push ${ACR_NAME}.azurecr.io/tcp-to-blob:latest
scripts.docker-push-canary: yarn docker-build-canary && yarn docker-tag-canary && docker push ${ACR_NAME}.azurecr.io/tcp-to-blob-canary:latest
